name: BLAST DWARF (BillyTheWhizz, Devillas, LewiLewi)
description:
A short action-packed dwarflike with randomized ore rarities

Mine awesome ores, craft crazy bombs, defeat Eyezekiel!

- STORY -

After one too many drinks at the Mars bar, Cpt. Masey crashes his ship on a far-away planet inhabited by dangerous aliens! Unfortunately for them, he's the best demolitions expert in the galaxy.

- CONTROLS -

WASD - move

E or i - open/close bomb crafting menu

mouse - aim bomb

left click - throw bomb

- CRAFTING BOMBS -

Left click on your collected ores on the right

Drag the slider to measure out how much of each ore per bomb

Submit to confirm

Right click the ore on the left to remove it

- BESTIARY -

Glen - likes rugby, favourite colour is green

Lou - professional pilot, favourite colour is blue

Fred - loves spicy food, favourite colour is red

Eyesaak - always crying, loves every colour he sees

Eyezekiel - gets really mad about football, only sees red
